name: Wheelie Balance
description:
Willy finds himself in a difficult situation and has to keep his balance without going too high or too low.

A  game made in 1 week for the Weekly Game Jam 207.

Controls:

  • When you click the platform you create balloons to go up.
  • You can click the balloons to pop them and go down.
  • Movement of Willy: A/D
  • Restart: R
  • Pause: Escape

Made by:

  • Marc González Estrada - kitoss
  • Arnau Albertí Serra - zooky12
